name: @cosmos/sp1-ics07-tendermint
description: This is a zero knowledge IBC tendermint light client written using SP1 and ibc-rs (WIP)

scripts.lint:sol: forge fmt --check && bun solhint -w 0 -c .solhint.json 'contracts/**/*.sol' && bun natspec-smells --enforceInheritdoc false --include 'contracts/src/**/*.sol'
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
